definition: Hai He (a system of five waterways around Tianjin, flowing into Bohai 渤海 at Dagukou 大沽口)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Hai
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]

sentences.english: Research of Eco-water Table and Rational Depth of Groundwater of Tarim River Drainage Basin;
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了恢复海河流域地下水生态水位的措施。

sentences.english: In the history, the mountain area of the Haihe River valley was a dense forest.
sentences.chinese: 历史上的海河流域山区曾经草深林密。

sentences.english: The Grand Canal joins the Haihe at Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 大运河在天津与海河汇合。

sentences.english: Haihe River, breeds up the cradle of Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 海河，孕育了天津这座城市奔放且坦荡的本性。

sentences.english: The effectiveness of the proposed method is verified by the application to the analysis on water balance in Haihe River basin.
sentences.chinese: 最后以海河流域水量平衡模拟为例，检验了其有效性。

sentences.english: The north of the province is drained by tributaries of the Hai River, such as Sanggan and Hutuo rivers.
sentences.chinese: 山西北部由海河的支流流过，例如桑干河和滹沱河。

sentences.english: It unites the design like the Hia he river unites the city of Tian Jin.
sentences.chinese: 设计结合就象海河与天津市的发展结合。

sentences.english: The east Haihe River plain area is one of the regions which are short of water resources in China.
sentences.chinese: 海河平原东部地区是中国水资源最紧缺的地区之一。

sentences.english: After lunch, he enjoy a fine view of the Haihe River by boat.
sentences.chinese: 午饭后，他享受美丽的景色的海河乘船。

sentences.english: However, historical and cultural city of Tianjin'sposition cannot be separated from the Haihe River.
sentences.chinese: 但是天津历史文化名城的定位离不开海河。

sentences.english: Zhangze Reservoir is a large sized reservoir in Haihe Catchment of Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 漳泽水库是山西省境内海河流域的一座大型水库。

sentences.english: They said we'd take a detour route in order cross the Haihe River Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 不过他们都说要绕道海河大桥。

sentences.english: Originated in the region living in the Haihe River, the ancient people's water transport.
sentences.chinese: 起源于居住在海河区域的古代人的水上交通运输工具。

sentences.english: Water and soil erosion is one of the prominent ecological environment problems of Haihe River Basin.
sentences.chinese: 水土流失是海河流域较为突出的生态环境问题之一。

sentences.english: The grain region of the Hai River Basin relies on groundwater for 70pc of irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 海河流域的产粮区，地下水占了灌溉用水的70%。

sentences.english: Besides Haihe there are some other rivers like this.
sentences.chinese: 除了海河，还有一些其它的河流也是如此。

definition: Tanggu former district of Tianjin, now part of Binhai subprovincial district 濱海新區|滨海新区[Bin1 hai3 xin1 qu1]
Luan River
canal

Pearl River (Guangdong)
the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC
Dagang former district of Tianjin, now part of Binhai subprovincial district 濱海新區|滨海新区[Bin1 hai3 xin1 qu1]
Hun River
Huangpu River in Shanghai
Yellow River or Huang He
Bohai Bay
Yongding River to the West of Beijing
Songhua River in Jilin province 吉林省 through Harbin 哈尔滨, a tributary of Heilongjiang 黑龍江|黑龙江
Hangu former district of Tianjin, now part of Binhai subprovincial district 濱海新區|滨海新区[Bin1 hai3 xin1 qu1]
Yalu River, forming part of the China-Korea border
another name for Tianjin 天津
